sentences.sentence: The blade of the oar had entangled itself with the strap of her bag.
sentences.translation: 桨叶和她包的带子紧紧缠在了一起。

sentences.sentence: Each person has one oar which goes on one side.
sentences.translation: 每个人都有一只桨，放在一边。

sentences.sentence: They shoved off, presently, Tom in command, Huck at the after oar and Joe at the forward.
sentences.translation: 他们很快就开船了，由汤姆掌舵，哈克划后桨，乔划前桨。
